boris.Introduction: Ah, Mayor Lewis told me you just arrived. I'm Boris!#$e#I sell livestock and animal care products at my ranch. You should swing by some time.$h
boris.Mon: I love animals, @ and isn't becase I'm one. $h#If you treat yours well I'm sure we'll become good friends!
boris.Tue: My nephew Shane has been staying at my place the last few months.#$e#He helps me out with the chickens, so I'm not complaining.
boris.AcceptGift_Negative_coffee_item: Cofee??!!  #$a for a animal?!! #$a You got drink with Shane? $0
conny.AcceptGift_Negative_coffee_item: Oh... Boris doesn't let me drink coffee ...$s
conny.Resort: Boris told me not to get burnt... But I think he forgot the I'm a , it feels cool, so I think I'll be okay.$h
conny.movieTheater: Boris says I'm not old enough to see a movie by myself...$s
conny.Wed4: Boris won't let me go out after 6 o'clock. It's not fair!$s#$e#I'm not afraid of the dark anymore!
conny.Sat2: Sometimes I look for crawdads in the river. Don't tell Boris... but I fed one to a cow once.#$e#She loved it.
conny.Sun2: Shane's gone a lot, and Boris is busy all the time... so I have to invent my own games.#$e#I'm thankful for all my toys.$h
